data.title: Best Boarding High School in New Jersey
data.meta_description: Blair Academy is a dynamic, coeducational New Jersey boarding school where high school students pursue a superior college preparatory education.
data.text: Blair Academy does not discriminate on the basis of sex, age, creed, race, color, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability status, or national and ethnic origin in the administration of its education policies, admission, scholarships, loans or other school-administered programs. Each Blair student is afforded the rights, privileges and social, academic, artistic and athletic opportunities that are generally accorded or made available to students of the School.
